sentence.Network_en: Elections were postponed the day before polling was due to take place.
sentence.Network_cn: 在预定进行投票的前一天选举被延期。

sentence.Network_en: Vietnam made an official request that the meeting be postponed.
sentence.Network_cn: 越南已经正式请求将会议推迟。

sentence.Network_en: He postponed his trip at the eleventh hour.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在最后时刻推迟了行程。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Did you get the message the meeting has been postponed ?, 你得没得到通知 , 会议已经推后了?
visit postponed and tickets remain valid., 参观改期 , 门票不作废.

list.abs: 会计词汇A ... posting reference 过账索引 postponable cost 可延缓成本 postulate of accounting 会计假设.
postponement延期，延迟日期postponement analysis延缓投资分析postretirement benefits退休后津贴
·类型延迟（form postponement）（Form Postponement）: 通过标准化延迟（减少）多样化.百度百科中的词条正文与判断内容均由用户提供，不代表百度百 …
postpone 延期postponement survey 延期检验postponement 推迟

entry.def: If you postpone an event, you delay it or arrange for it to take place at a later time than was originally planned.

example.ex: He decided to postpone the expedition until the following day...
example.tran: 他决定把探险推迟到第二天。

example.ex: The visit has now been postponed indefinitely.
example.tran: 参观现在已经被无限期推迟了。

auth_sentence.content: The gathering had been postponed three times this month.

auth_sentence.content: The Syrian opposition has postponed forming a transitional government.
